app.title.description: Title of the app displayed in the header section

app.description.defaultMessage: Transform your Canva design into a professional, responsive website in one click.
app.description.description: Description text explaining what the app does

button.generate.description: Text on the main action button when ready to generate

button.generating.description: Text on the button while the website is being generated

feature.multipage.description: Feature description indicating multi-page design support

feature.responsive.description: Feature description indicating mobile responsive output

feature.icons.description: Feature description indicating professional icon usage

success.message.description: Success message shown when generation completes

success.view.description: Link text to view the generated website

error.api.defaultMessage: Failed to generate website. Please try again.
error.api.description: Error message when API call fails

error.export.defaultMessage: Failed to export design. Please check your permissions.
error.export.description: Error message when Canva export fails
